Pour sterile solution.sentence: The nurse prepares a sterile workspace by cleaning the area and gathering necessary supplies.
Pour sterile solution.subject: The nurse

Pour sterile solution.sentence: The nurse selects an appropriate sterile solution from the inventory.
Pour sterile solution.subject: The nurse

Pour sterile solution.sentence: The nurse opens the sterile solution container carefully to maintain sterility.
Pour sterile solution.subject: The nurse

Pour sterile solution.sentence: The nurse pours the sterile solution into a clean receptacle without contaminating it.
Pour sterile solution.subject: The nurse

Pour sterile solution.sentence: The nurse disposes of the empty container and any used materials according to safety protocols.
Pour sterile solution.subject: The nurse
Pour sterile solution.object: the empty container and any used materials
